actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend the coastwise laws of the United States to the U.S. Virgin Islands with respect to the transportation in bulk of crude oil, unfinished oils, residual fuel oil, and finished products.

summary.text: Extends the coastwise laws of the United States to the Virgin Islands with respect to the transporation of crude oil, unfinished oils, residual fuel oil, and finished products.

titles.title: A bill to extend the coastwise laws of the United States to the U.S. Virgin Islands with respect to the transportation in bulk of crude oil, unfinished oils, residual fuel oil, and finished products.
